metadata.title: CVE-2024-39929 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Exim through 4.97.1 misparses a multiline RFC 2231 header filename, andthus remote attackers can bypass a $mime_filename extension-blockingprotection mechanism, and potentially deliver executable attachments to themailboxes of end users.

criterions.comment: exim4 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
